name: Open Archiver
description: A secure, sovereign, and open-source platform for legally compliant email archiving. Provides robust self-hosted solution for archiving, storing, indexing, and searching emails from major platforms including Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, PST files, and IMAP-enabled email inboxes. Features include universal ingestion, AES-256 encryption at rest, full-text search with Meilisearch, thread discovery, retention policies, file integrity verification, and comprehensive audit trails.
author: LogicLabs-OU

form_fields.label: Admin Password

form_fields.label: JWT Secret
form_fields.hint: Secret key for JWT token signing (use a long random string)

form_fields.label: Master Encryption Key
form_fields.hint: 32-byte hex string for encrypting sensitive data (generate with: openssl rand -hex 32)

form_fields.label: Storage Encryption Key
form_fields.hint: 32-byte hex string for AES-256 file encryption at rest (optional)

form_fields.label: Meilisearch Master Key
form_fields.hint: Master key for Meilisearch search engine

form_fields.label: Enable Deletion
form_fields.hint: Allow deletion of emails and ingestion sources
